snippet: Millions of people who had once flocked to President Obama’s promise of hope and change saw in Mr. Trump their best chance to be heard and protected....
abstract: Coalition of white voters Donald Trump assembled in order to win presidential election is unlike any other marshaled by previous Republican candidates; standard Republican coalition was bolstered by millions of voters in Upper and Lower Midwest, onetime bastions of liberal populism, along with bloc that had once voted for Pres Obama.

byline.original: By NICHOLAS CONFESSORE and NATE COHN
byline.contributor: Alan Blinder, Jess Bidgood and Frances Robles contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Millions of people who had once flocked to President Obama’s promise of hope and change saw in Mr. Trump their best chance to be heard and protected.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Victory Was Built on Unique Coalition of White Voters
headline.print_headline: White Voters in Broad Bloc Shaped Upset
